attributes.action: award a posthumous knighthhood to the author Eric Arthur Blair aka George Orwell in recognition of his having written the greatest book of the 20th century: NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everone knows 1984. It was an extremely successful book with a strong political message of what the future totalitarian state would be like. The book had a big influence on the English language with such phrases as "Big Brother is Watching You"; he invented the NewSpeak language of which "double plus unthink" is a typical example. Many of the ideas central to his book have come to pass and who knows what will be next to become true. Even this petition site is no more than the wall the Proles wrote on to let off steam.

rejection.details: Sorry but we no longer deal with posthumous award requests.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
